Cole Harbour is most easily accessible through the Halifax International Airport, which is roughly 15 miles away. Visitors can also reach Cole Harbour from Yarmouth, Nova Scotia. Although a seven hour drive, visitors will experience the beautiful scenery as they travel along Nova Scotia's coast.

value: .  Step back in time when you walk along the winding paths through the rose bushes. Whether you are a fan of landscape architecture or are just looking to escape the hectic city life, these free, public gardens are the perfect place to relax. Originally established as a private garden in the early 1800's, the gardens have been run by the Nova Scotia Horticultural Society since 1876.
